abstract: Visa said that it had sold roughly 136.5 million shares VisaNet do Brasil through its Visa International subsidiary, in connection with the Brazilian unit’s I.P.O.
snippet: Visa said that it had sold roughly 136.5 million shares VisaNet do Brasil through its Visa International subsidiary, in connection with the Brazilian unit’s I.P.O.
lead_paragraph: Visa on Wednesday said that it had sold roughly 136.5 million shares VisaNet do Brasil through its Visa International subsidiary, in connection with the Brazilian unit’s initial public offering.

headline.main: Visa Sells Shares of Brazilian Business in I.P.O.
